resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104856</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104856</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204586</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">g: a pendulum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">g: ein Pendel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">g : un pendule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">g: um pêndulo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">g: un pendolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γ: ένα εκκρεμές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">g: un péndulo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will time the periods of pendulums to determine if length or mass affects them. Students can then use a pendulum to calculate the acceleration of gravity.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer setzen Zeit Perioden der Pendel 
fest, um festzustellen, wenn Länge oder Masse sie beeinflußt. 
Kursteilnehmer können ein Pendel dann benutzen, um die 
Beschleunigung von Schwerkraft zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants chronométreront les périodes des 
pendules pour déterminer si la longueur ou la masse les affecte. 
Les étudiants peuvent alors utiliser un pendule pour calculer 
l'accélération de la pesanteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes cronometrarão os períodos dos 
pêndulos para determinar se o comprimento ou a massa os afetarem. 
Os estudantes podem então usar um pêndulo calcular o 
acceleration da gravidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi cronometreranno i periodi dei pendoli 
per determinare se la lunghezza o la massa li interessa. Gli 
allievi possono allora utilizzare un pendolo per calcolare 
l'accelerazione di gravità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">_ σπουδαστής θα χρόνος ο περίοδος εκκρεμές να 
καθορίζω εάν μήκος ή μάζα έχω επιπτώσεις αυτός. Οι 
σπουδαστές μπορούν έπειτα να χρησιμοποιήσουν ένα εκκρεμές για να
υπολογίσουν την ταχύτητα της βαρύτητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes medirán el tiempo de los 
períodos de péndulos para determinarse si la longitud o la masa los 
afecta. Los estudiantes pueden entonces utilizar un péndulo 
para calcular la aceleración de la gravedad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>

            <value>yes</value>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104856</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
